name: 种子精
description: 刚从古老种子中苏醒的小精灵，头顶的嫩芽会随着心情摇摆。吸收阳光后会变得活泼。

features: 脸上有可爱的叶片面纹

image_prompts.design: A round green plant spirit with a sprout and flower bud on its head. Cute leaf patterns on face, small root-like feet. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on leaf shapes, ink sketch texture on plant patterns, non-reflective surface with matte green tones, adorable and photosynthetic.
